translations: 溜冰；滑动；略略触及（skate 的三单形式）

sentences.sentence: I struggled to keep my balance on my new skates.
sentences.translation: 我穿着新溜冰鞋，努力保持平衡。

sentences.sentence: On the way out a boy of about ten came up on roller skates.
sentences.translation: 在出去的路上，一个大约十岁的男孩穿着旱冰鞋滑了过来。

sentences.sentence: I have a good pair of skates, but no matter how tightly I lace them, my ankles wobble.
sentences.translation: 我有一双很好的溜冰鞋，但是无论我把鞋带系得多么紧，我的脚踝还是在里面晃荡。
